summary: Provides a set of utilities to compute the basic plasma frequency quantities—such as plasma, gyro, Buchsbaum, lower‑hybrid and upper‑hybrid frequencies—based on particle species, density, magnetic field and temperature, with full Astropy unit support and optional JIT acceleration.
business_intent: Enable researchers and engineers to quickly obtain accurate characteristic frequencies for charged particles in plasma environments, supporting modeling, diagnostics and analysis in space, laboratory and fusion plasma applications.
